comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Edward Lauterbach (1844-1923), Chairman of the Republican County Committee in New York. politicalgraveyard.com/bio/latno-lavorato.html#RR602BBI3

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1913, Edward Lauterbach was defense attorney in the celebrated case of David Lamar, the so-called "Wolf of Wall Street." Here is Lamar's photo, also from the Bain photostream: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3681839897/in/p...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you both for finding out more about Edward Lauterbach.  We will include this information in the description when we update the database.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for him on Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Lauterbach
